lines.text: I couldn't find any aspirin but here's some potassium cyanide. Think this will cure the boss's toothache?
I'm the small shrimp with the flat hat and this is the moll with the blonde sport suit.

[to his girlfriend, thinking he's going to jail]
No matter what happens, my last thought will always be of you.
[they both get dragged into a room that's revealed to be the judge's office]
